fields.name: estimateMeterReadings
fields.description: Estimated meter readings.

fields.name: isCustomerKnownToKraken
fields.description:
Check whether a given customer is known to Kraken. The typical scenario to use this query in is to be able to tell whether an inbound cancellation market message concerns a Kraken account or not. Note: At the moment, this query only works for gas customers.

The possible errors that can be raised are:

- KT-DE-4501: Invalid postcode and city format.
- KT-CT-1113: Disabled GraphQL field requested.

fields.name: epexDayAheadPrices
fields.description: Get EPEX Day Ahead electricity prices for Germany. Returns price data in 15-minute intervals for the specified time period. Prices are in EUR/MWh.

fields.name: retentionQuote
fields.description:
The quoted products already offered to the customer for retention.

The possible errors that can be raised are:

- KT-CT-3823: Unauthorized.
- KT-CT-4719: No supply point found for identifier provided.
- KT-DE-4603: Required field missing from quote retention message.
- KT-CT-1113: Disabled GraphQL field requested.

fields.name: electricitySuppliers
fields.description: Returns all the electricity suppliers directly from the getAG API.

fields.name: gasSuppliers
fields.description: Returns all the gas suppliers directly from the getAG API.

fields.name: defaultElectricitySuppliers
fields.description:
Returns the default electricity suppliers and their tariffs for a given postcode from the getAG API.

Note that there is usually only one default supplier for a given postcode, but there may be multiple default suppliers for some postcodes.

fields.name: activeTariffs
fields.description: Get products list.

fields.name: agreement
fields.description: Get agreement by ID.

fields.name: cityByPostcode
fields.description: Returns the respective city of a given postcode. An invalid postcode will return an empty string.

fields.name: bankHolidays
fields.description: Returns all German bank holidays for a specified year that are observed in one or more states.

fields.name: electricityMeters
fields.description:
Fetch electricity meters for a given account and MeLo. 

 

This field is a connection type. Connections are used to implement [cursor based pagination](https://graphql.org/learn/pagination/#pagination-and-edges).

 

 

This field requires the `Authorization` header to be set.

fields.name: gasMeters
fields.description:
Fetch gas meters for a given account and MeLo. 

 

This field is a connection type. Connections are used to implement [cursor based pagination](https://graphql.org/learn/pagination/#pagination-and-edges).

 

 

This field requires the `Authorization` header to be set.

fields.name: estimatedElectricityConsumption
fields.description:
Fetch the estimated electricity consumption for a given MeLo at a given time period in kWh.

The possible errors that can be raised are:

- KT-DE-4710: Estimated consumption calculation failed.
- KT-CT-1113: Disabled GraphQL field requested.

fields.name: estimatedGasConsumption
fields.description: Fetch the estimated gas consumption for a given MeLo at a given time period in kWh.

fields.name: electricityMeterReadings
fields.description:
Fetch electricity meter readings for a given account and meter. 

 

This field is a connection type. Connections are used to implement [cursor based pagination](https://graphql.org/learn/pagination/#pagination-and-edges).

 

 

This field requires the `Authorization` header to be set.

fields.name: gasMeterReadings
fields.description:
Fetch gas meter readings for a given account and meter. 

 

This field is a connection type. Connections are used to implement [cursor based pagination](https://graphql.org/learn/pagination/#pagination-and-edges).

 

 

This field requires the `Authorization` header to be set.

The possible errors that can be raised are:

- KT-CT-4177: Unauthorized.
- KT-CT-1113: Disabled GraphQL field requested.

fields.name: accounts
fields.description: Get details about multiple accounts.

fields.name: accountsSearch
fields.description: Search for account that are already in Kraken and match the search terms.

fields.name: node
fields.description: Represents an individual object/resource in the API.

fields.name: termsandconditions
fields.description: Returns the terms and conditions based on the code and version. If a brand code is provided without version numbers, the latest terms and conditions are returned.

fields.name: termsandconditionsforproduct
fields.description: Returns a list of the active terms and conditions for a product.

fields.name: personalWinterWorkout
fields.description:
Statistics about an account's weekly and total gas savings during the Winter Workout.

The possible errors that can be raised are:

- KT-CT-3823: Unauthorized.
- KT-CT-3956: Temporary error occurred.
- KT-CT-1113: Disabled GraphQL field requested.

fields.name: collectiveWinterWorkout
fields.description:
Statistics about the combined weekly and total gas savings of all Winter Workout participants.

Note that the `targetSavingsRatio` will always be zero for these combined values.

The possible errors that can be raised are:

- KT-CT-3956: Temporary error occurred.
- KT-CT-1113: Disabled GraphQL field requested.
